components.ui.bound

Class UIComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.ui.bound.UIComponent

  • public class UIComponent
extends Object
    UIComponent Base class for UI Components that connect to a business component

      • UIComponent

        Parameters:

      • UIComponent

        public UIComponent(BBjWindow wnd!,
BBjNumber id,
BBjNumber x,
BBjNumber y,
BBjNumber w,
BBjNumber h,
BBjString title$)
        Constructor UIComponent Creates the component on a given Window using id and placement
        Parameters:
        BBjWindow - wnd!: the parent window to create the component on
        BBjNumber - id: the Control ID for of child window which is created on wnd!
        BBjNumber - x: x-coordinate
        BBjNumber - y: y-coordinate
        BBjNumber - w: width
        BBjNumber - h: height
        BBjString - title$: Title string for the component

BBjString comment$)
        Constructor UIComponent Creates the component on a given Window using id and placement

        BBjNumber - id: the Control ID for of child window which is created on wnd!
        BBjNumber - x: x-coordinate
        BBjNumber - y: y-coordinate
        BBjNumber - w: width
        BBjNumber - h: height
        BBjString - title$: Title string for the component
        BBjString - comment$: Comment string / user info

      • UIComponent

        public UIComponent(BBjWindow wnd!,
BBjNumber id,
BBjNumber x,
BBjNumber y,
BBjNumber w,
BBjNumber h)
        Constructor UIComponent Creates the component on a given Window using id and placement
        Parameters:
        BBjWindow - wnd!: the parent window to create the component on; pass null() to have the component create it's standalone parent window
        BBjNumber - id: the Control ID for of child window which is created on wnd!
        BBjNumber - x: x-coordinate
        BBjNumber - y: y-coordinate
        BBjNumber - w: width
        BBjNumber - h: height

BBjNumber height)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        BBjNumber ret: 1 = user hit "OK", 0 = user hit "Cancel" or closed / aborted the window

      • refresh

        public void refresh(BBjNumber resetFilter)
        Method refresh: this method is called from the business component when a refresh of the displayed data is required (needs overriding)
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - resetFilter: if set to 1, the UI Component needs to clear any filtering defined on UI side

      • onSelectionChange

        public void onSelectionChange()
        Method onSelectionChange: This method is called from the business component when the selection changed (needs overriding)

      • canSelectionChange

        public BBjNumber canSelectionChange(BBjNumber force)
        Method canSelectionChange: This method is called from the business component when the selection changed (needs overriding)
        Parameters:
        force: - if set to 1, enforce saving unsaved data as selection will undeniably change
        Returns:
        canChange: 0 = can't change, 1 = change is OK

      • interruptQueryCallback

        public BBjNumber interruptQueryCallback()
        Method interruptQueryCallback: this method is called from the business component to determine if the user requested an interrupt of an ongoing process of a database query.The UI component can e.g. create a button on the window to cancel a request and set a variable accordingly so the next call to this method can return 1 and the business component knows that the query needs to be escaped (needs overriding)
        Returns:
        BBjNumber interrupt: 0 = no interrupt, 1 = user interrupted the process

      • moreDataPulled

        public void moreDataPulled(BBjNumber oldsize,
BBjNumber newsize)
        Method moreDataPulled: this method is called from the business component to notify the UI Component that the result now grew the interested UI component may now populate more data rows on the screen, i.e. a grid (needs overriding)
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - oldsize: the prior size of the resultset
        BBjNumber - newsize: the new size of the resultset

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(BBjNumber percentage)
        Method setProgress: This method is called from the business component to report the progress of a query (needs overriding)
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - percentage: the new percentage value, range between 0 and 100

      • invokeCallback

        public static void invokeCallback(Object obj!,
BBjString methodName$,
Object payload!)
        Method invokeCallback: invoke a method in a given class and pass an object with data
        Parameters:
        Object - obj!: the object that holds the method that will be called
        BBjString - nethodName$: the name of the method
        Object - payload!: the object that is passed to the method

        Method setEditing invoked from BusinessComponent if a UI component started editing a record in the resultset
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - isEditing: -1 = i

        public void onPartialUpdate(BBjNumber recno)
        Method onPartialUpdate invoked from Business Component, broadcasting the change of a record
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - recno: the record number within the resultset that has been updated

      • onSoftlockStatusChange

        public void onSoftlockStatusChange(BBjNumber recno,
BBjNumber isLocked)
        Method onPartialUpdate invoked from Business Component, broadcasting the change of a record
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - recno: the record number within the resultset that has been updated
        BBjNumber - isLocked: 1 = record was locked, 0 = record was unlocked

      • onMenuExit

        public void onMenuExit(BBjEvent ev!)

      • onBroadcastEdit

        public void onBroadcastEdit(BBjNumber recNo,
BBjString fieldName$,
BBjString newContent$)
        Method onBroadcastEdit: called by BC to notify the UI about an ongoing edit from a different side
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - recNo: the record number that was edited
        BBjString - fieldName$: the field name that just was edited
        BBjSting - newContent$: the new Contents of the field

      • registerForeignKeyFormClass

        protected void registerForeignKeyFormClass(BBjString fieldName$,
BBjString className$)
        Method registerForeignKeyFormClass: register the class name for a field, which is foreign key
        Parameters:
        BBjString - fieldName$: the field name
        BBjString - className$: the class name of the UIComponent of the foreign key field

      • registerForeignKeyFormLink

        protected void registerForeignKeyFormLink(BBjString fieldName$,
UIComponent uic!)
        deprecated because the form is created even in cases where it's never used use registerForeignKeyFormClass instead!

      • getForeignKeyFormLink

        protected UIComponent getForeignKeyFormLink(BBjString fieldName$)
        Method getForeignKeyFormLink: get the UIComponent for a foreign key field
        Parameters:
        BBjString - fieldName$: the foreign key field name
        Returns:
        UIComponent className$: the UIComponent of the foreign key field
